name: OpenWebUIChat
short: Advanced AI assistant with OpenWebUI integration
description: Set up and configure an AI assistant (or chat) cog for your server with OpenWebUI language models, with configurable prompt injection, dynamic embeddings, custom function calling, and more
author: Geri
install_msg: Loaded OpenWebUIChat â€“ use [p]openwebuichat to talk to your model, [p]openwebuiassistant setup to configure.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores prompts and OpenWebUI API keys on a per server basis. If enabled, conversations with the bot are also persistently stored. Embeddings and memories are stored locally using ChromaDB.
